name: Streamlined Asana
description: A streamlined, customizable theme for Asana with more whitespace, team separators (sidebar), and a cleaner task list. Oh, and I've brought ♥s back! (Choose in Advanced Style Settings below before install or update.) Wider custom field columns (if you got 'em) for better usability. Oh, and thicker project highlight colors next to project names. Lots o' little things to make your Asana experience better. Updated regularly for the good of all mankind...and my own sanity. ;)
